reviewText: I don't mind the voices in Russian at all.  If they would just redo the text and interface in English that would be great.  Otherwise it is unplayable for anyone who does not speak Russian.

reviewText:
More, better, stronger.
If the whole Planet Alcatraz gave our characters Private rank...then what you need to be to get Sgt. rank?
To find it out and prove yourself - you need to return to twisted planet populated with mad house patients.

If you deal with language barrier first.
I'll wait for it. I made two playthrough of PA1 + let's play for it so getting sequel was a matter of time.
